column1: [3] The  Assessor by letter dated 10.03.2005 (“B”) acting under Section 134
(3) of the Inland Revenue Act, No. 38 of 2000 rejected the return of income
for the year of assessment 2001/2002 for the following reasons:
1. According to the documents produced by the Appellant, no export
has been made during the year of assessment;
2.  Therefore,  the  concessional  rate  of  15%  under  Section  47  of  the
Inland Revenue Act, No. 38 of 2000 is not applicable and income tax to
be calculated at the rate of 35%.
